entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33 with temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 33 with temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 37.
